Photos

Feb 16, 2003

Hundreds of thousands of people around the world staged antiwar protests in scores of cities

…. hmmm I’m pretty sure it was in the millions from what I’ve read. Hell, even the NY Times admits that there were nearly a million in London alone. But in any case, the NY Times does have some great photos, here. (I found the actual URL so you don’t have to deal with the NY Times Javascript pop-ups that don’t work if you have pop-up blocking on. And I did the same thing for the annoying BBC pop-ups as well. You can view the BBC slideshow here. And the same for the Washington Post photos here.
